pageContext.claim: “I read this morning where Stacey Abrams has 850,000 ballots accumulated. Now that's called harvesting. You're not allowed to harvest.....But how can she say she has 850,000 ballots? That would mean that she's got 850,000 ballots for her, that's not supposed to be happening.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is confused here. Ballot harvesting is illegal in Georgia. But Abrams, through the efforts of her two organizations, Fair Fight and the New Georgia Project, registered upward of 800,000 new voters in the lead-up to the 2020 election.
